title: How long does it take to apply patches?
body: I had a problem with my download speed on the LoL patcher so I completely uninstalled LoL then reinstalled it and it downloaded everything at 3mb/s so now I'm at 60% and it's applying about 6GB of stuff

replies.body:
Hey there,

It's been about an hour now since you submitted this post, is the patcher still stuck?
Just letting you know i fixed it by COMPLETELY uninstalling League of Legends using Revo Uninstaller then reinstalled. Downloaded at 3mb/s and yeah
